group_1.textLeft: Tomorrow is the big day! The hiking rally is@almost here.
Look at this!
I prepared a list of things to bring along@tomorrow.

group_1.textRight: Candy, lip balm... Body spray...[chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]@A selfie stick?!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Is something missing?
I asked around to find out what high school@girls carry around with them.

group_1.textRight: This isn't some kind of after school trip,@you know.

group_1.textLeft: Honestly! You two can't take a joke.
Hm?

group_1.textRight: We all have to take our own lunch, don't we?@Will you bring yours?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'm going to make my own lunch to take.
Oh, don't worry![chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1] I'll pack a lunch for you@too, Masara!
Ah! Did you already ask your mom to make@one?
Then, it's okay if I make you one, right?
We've got about...10 minutes.
She hasn't contacted us or anything. Maybe@something happened?

group_1.textCenter: No looking up the quiz answers online, now!@We'll consider it cheating!
So if you have phones or any other devices...
Please hand them to the nearest staff member@so they can hold on to them for you!

group_1.textLeft: What should we do...
A-ah...uh,[chara:301602:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301602:cheek_0][chara:301602:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:301602:lipSynch_1] c-can I keep it for just a bit@longer?
I want to make one last call...

group_1.textRight: Of course! Just tell me when you're ready.

group_1.textLeft: Okay, thank you.
I'll try calling her one more time...
[surround:7105_telphone]...

[chara:301602:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...!? [wait:0.8][chara:301602:lipSynch_1]She picked up!@[chara:301602:lipSynch_0][wait:0.3][chara:301602:cheek_0][chara:301602:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:301602:lipSynch_1]Hello? Mitama?

group_1.textRight: Sorry I didn't pick up earlier.
I didn't notice it was ringing.

group_1.textLeft: Are you serious? What were you doing?!

group_1.textRight: Hm? Right now I'm baking some sweet@potatoes...

group_1.textLeft: You're what?! Sweet potatoes?!

group_1.textRight: Ah, did you want to have some?

group_1.textLeft: No, that's not why! The hiking rally!
Remember? It starts in 10 minutes!

group_1.textRight: Oooh, that's right... Time certainly flies,@doesn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Wha... How are you being so calm?
You can still make it! Hurry and get over@here!

group_1.textRight: But I'm not hiking. Why should I hurry over?
If I get too much sun, it isn't pretty...@I turn bright red like a tomato!

group_1.textLeft: Wha?!

group_1.textRight: I don't think I said I was participating.@Did I?

group_1.textLeft: Well...

group_1.textCenter: We're going to aim for first place!
I prepared a list of things to bring along@tomorrow.

group_1.textLeft: â€¦You seemed the most excited about it.

group_1.textRight: Well, I really do have my eyes on the prize!@First prize, that is. The rice.
With the two of you working together, I'm@sure you'll get that rice for me, right?

group_1.textLeft: What...

group_1.textRight: Ah! The sweet potatoes are burning!

group_1.textLeft: Wha! Hang on!
[turnEffect:stop]She hung up...
[chara:301602:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait, whaaat?!
